page.title: 15Housing in New Town S.W.F.
page.content: South Woodham Ferrers is a town full of diverse accents, as people pour into the town from many different places, even as far away as Scotland, Ireland and Switzerland. They have left their families and friends behind to seek a new life in a new area. 85% of the people we questioned have lived in South Woodham Ferrers for less than 5 years and 40% less than 2 years. 75% of the properties these people own are detached and 60% are less than 5 years old. The houses, although attractive and large, are built very closely together and most have small gardens. Nevertheless many families enjoy gardening. The varied style of the houses and the tidy gardens give the town a special charm.
